q_en: I am Advanced Sewers. What are the tasks I have not yet completed?

steps.sql: SELECT id FROM working_group WHERE name = 'Advanced Sewers';
steps.description: Retrieve the working group ID for the working group with the name "Advanced Sewers"

steps.sql: SELECT st.id, st.start_time, st.end_time, op.product_id, op.number FROM sewing_tasks st JOIN order_product op ON st.order_product_id = op.id WHERE st.working_group_id = '8' AND st.status IN (0, 1);
steps.description: Retrieve the sewing tasks that are not yet completed (status 0: not start, 1: on-going) for the working group "Advanced Sewers"

steps.sql: SELECT p.id, pt.description, p.attributes FROM products p JOIN products_types pt ON p.products_type_id = pt.id WHERE p.id IN (12, 28, 4, 30, 15, 25, 18, 20);
steps.description: Retrieve the product names for the product IDs obtained in Step2

response:
